text.section: Except as otherwise provided in § 15-307.1 of this subtitle, an applicant who otherwise qualifies for a license is entitled to be examined as provided in this section.
The Board periodically shall give the examinations required under this subtitle to qualified applicants at the times and places that the Board determines.
The Board shall give each qualified applicant notice of the time and place of examination.

As provided for applicants for a license to practice land surveying under § 15-305 of this subtitle, the Board shall give the following 2 separate examinations:
a written examination in the fundamentals of land surveying; and
a written examination in the principles and practice of land surveying.

section.section: The Board shall determine the subjects, scope, and form of and method of grading and passing scores for the examinations given under this subtitle.
The Board shall structure the examinations to test the ability of an applicant to design, plan, and direct land surveying in order to ensure the safety of life, health, and property.
